SageTVPlugin.Name: Scrobbler
SageTVPlugin.Description:
A last.fm scrobbler plugin.
In order to use the plugin, it needs to be configured and enabled.
Option 1 - Client installation When installed in a SageTV Client (SageTVClient.exe), configure the plugin using the plugin configuration screen.
Option 2 - Server installation When installed in a SageTV server client (SageTV.exe), you have to manually configure the plugin as follows if a plugin configuration screen does not appear. To manually configure the plugin, you will need to add your last.fm username and password to SageClient.properties and also set the plugin to be active.
Any time a setting is changed, you will need to disable and enable the plugin.
The following settings are stored in SageClient.properties: scrobbler/scrobble=true or false scrobbler/username=your last.fm username scrobbler/password=your last.fm password
NOTE: The password is stored in plain text. Secure access to it to your liking.
